name: Hackman - the smartest IRC robot
short_description:
Hackman is an IRC-robot originally written in the TCL-language and was together with eggdrop acting on IRC. It could talk to users (using a home-made AI-system) and it amused everyone.

The new Hackman is written entirely in Python. Even the IRC-support
